6.2 Edit Menu

As you may have noticed, there is no ``Paste'' entry in the Edit menu. If you want to add some program code from another application, say a python editor, to your own custom strategies on the User Defined Strategies page, you can access the usual cut, copy and paste functions on this page via keyboard with crtl-x, crtl-c, crtl-v respectively.

Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
